properties.areaDesc: Vermillion, IN; Parke, IN; Vigo, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:53AM EST until February 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for a portion of the following waterway in west central
Indiana...

Wabash River...

.Lowland flooding is expected to develop Friday on the Wabash
River at Clinton and last over the weekend.  The flood crest
should be less than one foot above flood stage.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Wabash River at Clinton.
* from Thursday evening to Sunday afternoon.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Forecast...It is forecast to rise above flood stage Thursday
evening, crest at 18.5 feet Friday afternoon and then fall below
flood stage by late Saturday night.
* At 18.0 feet...River road near Mecca and lowest areas of river park
at Clinton begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
